Rochelle Ryndia Ray (Camden, New Jersey) bụ ónyé America rapper, ónyé na-agụ egwu, ónyé na'ede egwu na onye na-emepụta egwu, nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Lady Crush A maara ya maka ịbụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị rapper kachasị nta edere na ndekọ vinyl na njedebe nke ógè hip-hop nke Old-school. E gosipụtara Lady Crush na akwụkwọ Clover Hope nke 2021 'The Motherlode: 100+ Women Who Made Hip-Hop'

Lady Crush mèrè rap mbụ ya na 1984 mgbe ọ meriri asọmpi redio ọbọdọ niile, na-enweta onye ọbịa na egwu Tim Greene "The Facts of Life" (Importe/12, SugarScoop Records). Egwú ahụ mechara nweta nkwanye ùgwù mgbe ónyé na-eme ihe nkírí a ma ama COD, remixed egwu ahụ mepụtara "The Dub of Life"
A tọhapụrụ 12" a na mbido afọ 1985. Lady Crush kpebiri, ka e mesịrị na 1985 ịmalite ọrụ ya n'onwe ya mgbe ọ hapụsịrị otu ahụ
"MC Perpetrators", a na-akpọ ya ugbu a dị ka ihe ndekọ rap zuru ụwa ọnụ, nke a na-adịghị ahụkebe na nke bárá uru, a na-ere ya dị ka $ 610.

N'afọ 2018, mgbè ihe karịrị afọ 30 gachara na Hip-Hop, Lady Crush laghachiri mgbe o toro na egwu abụọ Electro hop, Underground hip hop na Dirty rap "F**k" na "F**K (The Banga). "Fifty Shades of F**k" EP sochiri n'oge na-adịghị ányá, na-agwakọta usoro egwu ya gara aga.
